name: Louis Garneau Neokid III Snowshoes - Children to Youths
description: Pint-sized snowshoes for big winter adventures. The Neokid III Snowshoes are easy to use and ergonomically designed for a natural, easy stride. The decks shed snow, so they don't get heavy as kids walk. The super-solid crampons provide great traction in varying conditions to add confidence to winter exploring.Polymer-moulded decks are lightweight yet durable, and stay flexible down to -40°C.Ergonomic shape encourages a natural stride for happy trekking.Easy to use ratchet bindings provide a locked-in, comfortable fit without pressure points.V-Rail traction is moulded onto the polymer deck for multi-directional traction uphill, downhill or traversing.Carbon steel crampons under toes provide traction and stability in varying conditions.
